Package com.CMPUT301W20T24.OnMyWay

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CancelRideButtonListener
    Implement this interface and the methods will be called after login method finishes (before other user information is fetched)
    CurrentUserInfoPulledListener
    Implement this interface and onCurrentUserInfoPulled will be called after the information for the currently logged in user is fetched
    LoginListener
    Implement this interface and the methods will be called after login method finishes (before other user information is fetched)
    UserDeletedListener  
    UserInfoPulledListener
    Implement this interface and onUserInfoPulled will be called after the information for the specified user is fetched
